TextBlock.Text: Be welcomed in this place. This tower shares with all who ask the knowledge needed to make his or her first quantum journey.
This colossal tower, once known as the <color=orange>Looming City,</color> was carved out of a towering mountain by the late Plume to shelter all Nomai exploring and working on Giant's Deep.
However, due to extenuating circumstances, the Nomai on Giant's Deep eventually decided to abandon this settlement, moving to new settlements constructed on the islands beyond this stormless space.
This tower would later be repurposed to house knowledge to begin one's quantum journey. You now stand beneath the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Trials.</color>
For those inquisitive about these circumstances, we welcome you to learn more about the settlers' history through scrolls we have left for guests to uncover within the tower.
